# Perfect Clarity (Ex)
## Overview
*Perfect Clarity (Ex)*: While using her [[Moment of Clarity (Ex)|moment of clarity]] rage power, the barbarian can roll twice for any miss chance or Will saving throws to disbelieve illusions, taking the better result. A barbarian must have the [[Moment of Clarity (Ex)|moment of clarity]] rage power before selecting this rage power.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 27
